description:
KFP, we've got a special message from our tenchou, @TakanashiKiara !🐔
The countdown to the hololive English 1st Concert - Connect the World - begins!

🎟️Stream tickets are still available!
➡️https://connecttheworld.hololivepro.com/tickets/

------------------------------
hololive English's first all-star concert, "hololive English 1st Concert -Connect the World-" , will be held at the YouTube Theater in Los Angeles on July 2nd, 2023 PDT!

🔽Concert Website🔽
Overseas : https://connecttheworld.hololivepro.com/
日本 : https://connecttheworld.hololivepro.com/jp/

🔽Concert Tickets (Venue/Streaming)🔽
Overseas : https://connecttheworld.hololivepro.com/tickets/
日本 : https://connecttheworld.hololivepro.com/jp/tickets/

🔽Concert Merchandise🔽
Overseas : https://connecttheworld.hololivepro.com/merch/
日本 : https://connecttheworld.hololivepro.com/jp/merch/

#holoENConnect
------------------------------

Follow the talents!
▶Takanashi Kiara
 @TakanashiKiara 
https://twitter.com/takanashikiara

Follow the official hololive English accounts!
▶Official YouTube channel:    @hololiveEnglish

title: #holoENConnect Countdown - Day 10 with Takanashi Kiara!
